content: Meanwhile, the PIRATE Party offers space on an internet server of their own to all CDU groups in Kassel that are affected by censorship by the party leaders.
translations: ita:Nel frattempo, il Partito dei Pirati offre dello spazio su un loro server internet per tutti i raggruppamenti CDU a Kass
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by BraveSentry (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
